metadata.Title: CVE-2023-4732 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.Description: A flaw was found in pfn_swap_entry_to_page in memory management subsystemin the Linux Kernel. In this flaw, an attacker with a local user privilegemay cause a denial of service problem due to a BUG statement referencingpmd_t x.

criterions.comment: linux package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
